start.hope: I hope this page is to your liking and you can learn more about me and my work.

about_me.hi: Hi, my name is Richard Vivas Ordo√±ez
about_me.description: I have been working in the world of web development for more than 3 years as a backend mostly in python, although I have knowledge in java, php and javascript (also starting in the fronted world). I have worked with startups such as Knowark, LQN, Mensajeros Urbanos, creating solutions and supporting their technological products and services. For this reason I make available my knowledge, skills, discipline and my desire to continue learning to achieve great goals together.
about_me.quote: Well done is better than well said.
